name: Timeline Traveler II: Dream
description:
Description


Timeline Traveler II is a puzzle game that combined time control and platformer element together to provide a new game experience. In the game, you need to control the timelines and change the moving timing of the character or objects in the scene to reach the goal!

Gameplay


The character and some specific objects in the scene will act according to the timelines. You may observe how is the movement of those object and change the moving timing by managing the timelines to reach the goal!

Synopsis


A girl wakes up in a fantasy world with blurred memories. By using Time Manipulation Magic, the girl need to explores unknown area, and solves all mysteries in the world.
